preferences.name: Steam extension actions
preferences.description: Take control of the Steam extension

preferences.name: Steam folder paths
preferences.description: Paths to folders containing 'steamapps' folders, separated by commas, first should have 'userdata' folder

preferences.name: Steam userdata folder name
preferences.description: Steam userdata folder name (a number) of current user in primary Steam folder

preferences.name: Steam Web API key
preferences.description: API key to use when fetching data (found at steamcommunity.com/dev/apikey)

preferences.name: Steam ID
preferences.description: 64-bit Steam ID to use when fetching data (found at store.steampowered.com/account)

preferences.name: Language
preferences.description: Language to display list items in, affects static titles and descriptions

preferences.name: Maximum list items
preferences.description: Maximum number of list items to show for results

preferences.name: Show uninstalled apps
preferences.description: Whether to show uninstalled apps in the list

preferences.name: Default friend action
preferences.description: Default action to perform when a friend is selected

preferences.name: Show friends' real info
preferences.description: Whether to show friends' real names and locations in the list

preferences.name: Show app and friend menus
preferences.description: Whether to show extra navigation items for apps and friends

preferences.name: Time between file reads
preferences.description: Time to wait before reading files on disk to update the cache

preferences.name: Time between Steam API calls
preferences.description: Time to wait before querying the Steam API to update the cache

preferences.name: App blacklist
preferences.description: IDs of apps to hide from the list, separated by commas

preferences.name: Friend blacklist
preferences.description: 64-bit Steam IDs of friends to hide from the list, separated by commas
